name: MyFox
description: Myfox provides you the peace of mind you deserve through an innovative smart home security system that deters rather that simply detecting danger. Because everyone understands that protecting properties and people is about avoiding dangers rather than simply detecting them as they happen, Myfox innovates easy-to-use smart home security systems that redefine true security through proactive deterrence, giving you the peace of mind that comes from knowing that your possessions are safe.
